segments.text: I see a boy standing on a stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching his body upward, trying to get as many cookies as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice his hand is already inside the jar, grabbing more cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate with his other hand, probably to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he knows how dangerous it is to stand on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors are open, framing him as he stands there precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl standing nearby, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant, like she's eager to get a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they both know they're not supposed to be taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
